sets.description: After successfully dealing damage, increase ATK by **18%/22%/26%/30%** for **30** seconds, does not stack. Only the highest star set will take effect.

While not using Benediction Resonance, cast Scattering Technique to increase final damage by **28%/32%/36%/40%** for **20** seconds. If you have Benediction Resonance, the final damage buff is reduced to **14%/16%/18%/20%** but applies to your teammates as well. Receive an additional (base ATK/10000)% final damage increase based on your ATK, up to **5%**. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, the highest star set will take effect.
